page.title: 02Ringmer Local News
page.content: In Spring the{Community Swimming Pool at the Comprehensive School was re-opened with a new roof, providing year round swimming. In May the {Liberals}gained the County Council seat of{Ringmer. }A{crime alert scheme was introduced to reduce crime by using voluntary public help and the local police. Cubs, Scouts and Guides delivered leaflets inviting people to attend an initial meeting and 200 did so. By July more than{Â£7000}had been given to a local appeal for the{ {Ethiopian Famine Fund.} Starting in August,{Delves House}and grounds will be developed by a local builder. The land around the pond in the south-eastern corner of the grounds has been given to the parish as an addition to the village green.
